data.message: Waiver cost weighting (points-based thresholds): Replaced count-based thresholds with risk-weighted points. High-risk rules (destructive_bash_commands, path_sandbox, force_push) = 3pts, medium-risk = 2pts, default = 1pt. Thresholds: warn > 10pts, fail > 20pts per week. Dashboard shows waivers + points, clusters show points and risk labels. Weights configurable via scoreboard. Commit 48db563 pushed.
